entry.title: $2350 // Amazing 2 Bedroom - Close to the Franklin C/S!!
entry.content:
Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom Apartment in Clinton Hill!

- Queen Sized Rooms
- New Kitchen w/ Stainless Steel Appliances + DISHWASHER
- Laundry in Building
- Windows and Closets in Both bedrooms
- Exposed Brick in Living Room
- NO BROKER'S FEE!!!

Located just around the corner from the Franklin C/S stop, you'll have easy transit to Manhattan and throughout Brooklyn. Right around the corner from neighborhood hot spots like Glorietta Baldy and Joloff.

For more info, please call text BEN at show contact info

entry.title: $2700 // Gut-renovated 2BR apartment in Developed Bed-Stuy!
entry.content:
Large 2 bedroom in a elevator building in a great location!

Beside 2 spacious bedrooms this immaculate unit has multiple windows throughout providing plenty of sunshine
* Hardwood floors * Multiple closet * A kitchen that includes stainless steel appliances (dishwasher & microwave) * Heat and hot water included

Restaurants, cafes, shopping and various attractions throughout the neighborhood

Steps to the A/C train at Nostrand Avenue and the LIRR Nostrand Avenue station.

Pets allowed

IT'S A ONE YEAR LEASE.
GOOD CREDIT -- 650+.
INCOME AROUND 40X THE RENT.
GUARANTORS ARE WELCOME.
NO BROKERS FEE.
FIRST & SECURITY TO MOVE IN!!

MurLee show contact info
